gameDetails.name: Taktika
gameDetails.description: At its heart, Taktika is a serious game of strategy and skill. The main difference between Taktika and other strategy games is that you flick your pieces around the table to set up attack and defense. Each player has an army of ten wooden discs. There are 3 types of units and they all move and attack differently. Scenarios are available with the base set and on the publisher's site.
